depth_levels.name: warmup
depth_levels.description: Low intimacy. Safe, factual, orientation. No probing.

depth_levels.name: narrative
depth_levels.description: What happened. Concrete details. Minimal emotion probing.

depth_levels.name: sensitive_core
depth_levels.description: High sensitivity. Only with consent; strong safety and stop rules.

rules.reason: Never increase depth or press the user when they refuse or show discomfort.
If distress indicators are high, stabilize and reduce intensity.
Do not escalate twice in a row unless the user is voluntarily going deeper.
When the user is short/evasive, avoid repeating pressure; stabilize and offer choices.
